info.title: Security Center
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.Security (Azure Security Center) resource provider

get.description: Get a security assessment on your scanned resource

parameters.name: assessmentName
parameters.description: The Assessment Key - Unique key for the assessment type

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

put.description: Create a security assessment on your resource. An assessment metadata that describes this assessment must be predefined with the same name before inserting the assessment result

parameters.name: assessmentName
parameters.description: The Assessment Key - Unique key for the assessment type

requestBody.description: Calculated assessment on a pre-defined assessment metadata

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

delete.description: Delete a security assessment on your resource. An assessment metadata that describes this assessment must be predefined with the same name before inserting the assessment result

parameters.name: assessmentName
parameters.description: The Assessment Key - Unique key for the assessment type

204.description: No Content - Assessment does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Get security assessments on all your scanned resources inside a scope

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope of the query, can be subscription (/subscriptions/0b06d9ea-afe6-4779-bd59-30e5c2d9d13f) or management group (/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/mgName).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

value.description: Collection of security assessments in this page

displayName.description: User friendly display name of the assessment
